review: Set up could not have been easier, and I'm loving the ability to enjoy Netflix from my originally non-wifi TV. Another great product solution from Google! Highly recommend!
author: Target Fan/Happy Mom

review: bought this to try it out and I don't like it as much as my roku streaming player because  the chromecast is kind of quirky to set up.
author: RockstarBruski

review: Easy to set up and learn how to use (in the over-50 age bracket).
author: CAM

review: Easy to set up! I reccomend this over Apple TV. You just plug it in and go!
author: McKenna Stone

review: One of the best tech devices you can buy and use. Awesome. So easy to use, virtually plug it in and its ready. I can't say enough about it. I am a geek and seldom find such a great value in a tech device. Google has done an awesome job. Very easy to stream anything that may be viewed on the internet to you TV. Very easy to "cast" you desktop to your TV. Excellent and at $30 it is a no brainer. Get one today.
author: Frank Grosso

review: I bought it just to try and what a surprise for the Excellent quality.  I'm very please! I will definitely buy another one for my bedroom, 100% recommended!
author: Juan Toledano
